sentences.sContent: The hotel is opposite the post office.
Men in the post office classify mail according to places it is to go.
sentences.sContent_eng: Men in the post office classify mail according to places it is to go.
sentences.sCn: 邮局里的人员将信件按寄送地点分类。

trans.tranOther: a place where you can buy stamps, send letters and packages etc
